Text: Price Discr New Powerhodge pst John New Power Company disagrees with the rate invoiced to them on deal for Nov ENA billed New Power a rate of IF CGAS Appal New Power claims the rate should be NYMEX Can you confirm what the correct rate should be Thanks Genaro

FW Nov Demand Charges billed to Northwest NaturalPST Kam I am not sure if Anne Bike is still with Enron but this email could not be delivered to her Can you look at the email below and let me know if it is something you can help me with Thanks Genaro Original Message From Mendoza Genaro Sent Monday January PM To Bike Anne Subject Nov Demand Charges billed to Northwest Natural Anne For Nov ENA billed Northwest Natural Gas for demand charges on deal and deal The total amount for each deal was The customer paid for only one of the deals Do you know if both deals are valid and the customer is responsible for paying both Note the comments on deal state sellers choice if gas is delivered Caly Basin use Please advise Thanks Genaro

Request for Deal PST Phillip Can you provide me with a Sitara deal for TAGG QQ I am currently working on OA and can not find where this TAGG goes This is for the Gulf region Please advise if you do not handle this region Thanks Genaro

FW Deal rate discrepancy with Enron NATheresa The formula BP is using is highlighted in red below After I inquired about the discrepancy my counterpart at BP emailed her trader who talked to Paul Lucci Apparently BP is using the correct pricing I just faxed copies of the invoices to you Thanks Genaro Original Message From Martin Alexa PWC ENRON Sent Thursday October PM To Mendoza Genaro Subject FW Deal rate discrepancy with Enron NA Looks like our price is correct Let me know if there are any other problems with this Thanks Alexa Martin BP Energy fax Original Message From Sedita Janice M Sent Thursday October AM To Martin Alexa PWC Subject RE Deal rate discrepancy with Enron NA Just spoke with Paul Lucci at Enron He agrees that they are not showing the correct equation Mine is correct His accountant will get back into the office tomorrow to make corrections Let me know if you do not hear from them in the next couple of days Original Message From Martin Alexa PWC Sent Thursday October AM To Sedita Janice M Cc Genaro Mendoza Email Subject Deal rate discrepancy with Enron NA Janice Good morning I have a price discrepancy for deal Anschutz Plant for and and if it is not corrected we could have a discrepancy for as long as the deal lasts until Enron is showing the rate to be Inside FERC NWPL Rockies less Mcf conversion In ET Deal our formula is NWPL Rocky Mountains IF Kern Wyoming IF Can you please verify who is correct and if Enrons rate is correct can you please make the changes for and the continuing months in the deal If we are correct can you please talk to your counterpart at Enron to see about getting this resolved this month My counterpart and I would both like to have this rate discrepancy cleared this month Please let me know if you need any additional information Thank you for all your help Thanks Alexa Martin BP Energy fax mailto
